title: Bless your spouse out loud (one sentence).
steps: Say one blessing over your spouse.
End with: 'I'm on your side today.'
messageTemplate: I’m blessing you today: _____. I’m on your side.
whyItHelps: Sets tone and unity with a quick faith-centered micro-ritual.

title: 7-minute couch talk (no screens).
steps: End with one sentence: 'How can I support you?'
messageTemplate: Can we do a 7-min couch talk tonight? No screens—just us.
whyItHelps: Creates emotional safety and connection in a doable timeframe.

title: 10-second hug at the door.
messageTemplate: When we see each other, can we do our 10-second hug?
whyItHelps: Small physical connection reduces stress and increases closeness.

title: Do one helpful thing in 10 minutes.
steps: Pick one small task your spouse dislikes.
Do it now without announcing it.
After, text: 'I took care of ____ for you.'
whyItHelps: Practical support builds trust and reduces mental load.
